name: test_haproxy_route_any_charm_requirer
description:
Deploy the charm with anycharm ingress per unit requirer that installs apache2.

    Assert that the requirer endpoints are available.
descriptionHtml:
Deploy the charm with anycharm ingress per unit requirer that installs apache2.

Assert that the requirer endpoints are available.

testStage.description:
Deploy the charm with anycharm ingress per unit requirer that installs apache2.

    Assert that the requirer endpoints are available.
